text: Suddenly a `Smart rules` option appeared in a custom module in the page editor, I can't find any reference anywhere though. Did someone sneak in this feature without telling us?
I also see it on one portal only, not on any other portals

Don't get me wrong, I know a lot of my colleagues will run to the liquor store to get a bottle of champagne when this is actually a feature, don't want to make them happy if I'm not sure this is actually a thing though :wink:

Hi! I think i found a bug:  When the {{ contact }} object is used on a page/template/module, caching is supposed to be turned off.  I am using that on a HubDB table powered page and detail page.  Caching indeed is turned off for the main/listing page, but the detail / single pages are still cached (and very sticky !). Furthermore, the {{ contact }} object doesn’t even seem to work on the detail/single page *unless* debug flag is on (?hsDebug=1).  If anyone can corroborate that’d be swell.    And, where else should I report the bug?
I think it is still in beta. We have it on some of our portals.
Beta went from private to public last week I believe
